title: [Suggestion] Project Katarina's art from hot pink to scarlet red
body:
I was originally skeptical about requesting things in the league forums seeing as how Riot is normally trying to avoid as much input from the community as possible, however seeing how some visuals are getting fixed due to community input I'll try my hand at it as well. 

Myself as well as a few other Katarina mains of various MMR are seeing different versions of the skins concept art (we are all familiar with what the final render is) and we (at least me and a few others) like Project Kat with a sort of Ruby or Scarlet Red highlights to her visor and other parts of the skins fx, etc as opposed to Hot Pink. 

Hot Pink in a sense makes the skin seem like its trying to be a Challenger skin and while a challenger skin isn't something I wouldn't like; this isn't a skin that is called as such. I personally am frustrated at the hair not being iconic red either but am able to cope with it since most of her skins change her hair in some way or another as well as the project skins all have white hair. 

That and it could be just me but Hot Pink doesn't seem very "sinister" to me. Probably the least threatening color. A deep ruby or scarlet red that's reminiscent of her iconic hair color or I don't know, the color of BLOOD would actually make the skin for me.

Thank you for your time. 
- Just another random Katarina main who adores the champion

replies.body:
Hey S Katarina 2 - 

First off, thanks for taking the time to leave feedback! It seems like you're pretty passionate about this lovely lady. ^-^ 

Keeping in line with PROJECT, we've decided to keep the tones more pink, similar to what you've seen with PROJECT: Fiora. This is similarly why we've chosen white hair for her; it's one of the iconic pieces for PROJECT, as you've mentioned. 

Side note, as we make more and more skins for Katarina, it's become tricky to give her more than just her signature red hair to switch things up! :P For Warring Kingdoms Katarina, we had a player suggest more of an ombré, which ended up working out pretty well. We've since utilized that style in other skins to break up longer chunks of hair! 

I do understand where you're coming from with the particles looking similar to the Challenger line. One of the larger differentiation there is the particle work. Challenger uses smoother, more wispy lines, and PROJECT focuses around more geometric shapes. Light armor v. full armor is also a significant different. Although, at first glance, I can totally see what you mean. 

It's not all bad news for PROJECT: Katarina, as we did take some player feedback and make some changes. 

We've heard your concerns about the spell effects on PROJECT: Katarina's Q and W. We will be making them louder to help them read better in game. When PROJECT: Katarina  get's a speed burst from W, she now has a trail to indicate the buff. 

If you get a chance to play/see the updates, I'd love to hear what you think! :)

With Kat's W. Why did you guys choose a weird ground bottom trail?

You guys could have done something like adding the ghost effect to her speed boost. ((leaving after images of herself behind her.))

This thematically makes sense.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aCojmKpGLqA

During her recall she leaves after images of herself when she starts twirling around. ((but this is the only time she does it.))

This would create a really cool image during her retreat combo after E+Wing. She'll become distorted looking and leave an after trail of multiple images of herself.  This matches her recall + overall theme of Katarina. But instead, she gets this derpy trail of pink behind her . . . . I don't really like it, and feel it's tacked on for the sake of being there just to say that you guys "did" something. 

Before people mention that it'd be confusing with ghost.

1. Nobody runs ghost on Kat.

2. Ghost is white.

Before anyone mentions that it'd confuse players:

1.Ekko's ult has been bugged since release, and it still doesn't effect people.

2. That's kind of the whole point of Katarina . . . she comes in like a whirl wind and then jets. It wouldn't confuse people anymore than she already does.

3. Animation clutter.

1. It really wouldn't be much animation clutter. Zed has more animations than Kat does as is, via the ability of having 2 shadows (( around 10 shadows in URF))

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4pEN_dSaXA

^ just in case anyone says it'd confuse people.


All together, I believe giving her brief after images of herself for a speed boost indication is better than her leaving a trail behind her of pink. I hope you actually take this into consideration and try it out to see what you guys think. It shouldn't take much effort to try, and I think if you actually pull off a few combos with all the skills during a team fight, you'll realize just how awesome it'd look compared to . . . a pink trail. Also, as said, thematically, it's clearly the superior choice.

It's just  one of those . . . extremely slight things you can add that can take a good skin and turn it into an amazing skin. If she had this attached to her W, I'd instantly buy it to be honest.  

Because if you pull off a pentakill with Katarina with the slight after images from W + blurring in and out with E it'll look really really really really really pretty.
Okay, so we did discuss your feedback, but the changes aren't something we're going to be adding to PROJECT: Katarina. What you're seeing on PBE is 95% final for this skin.

Katarina is one of my mains, you could- wait you've heard this before.

Seriously though, Thank you very much (@you and the skins team) for the awesome skins, you're making my vaca!!! Super Galaxy Fizz, Pool Party Fiora and Project: Katarina!!

They're all my mains!! 

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Ahh, it's awesome to hear that you're hyped! :D {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

95% final? How can that be possible and still keep the 1350 price? Ekko by being himself gets all of the extra animations which is fair. But over that he gets, a special taunt, he gets a spawning animation, and a respawning animation. Should Kat not be the one to get extra things to make up for her simplistic abilities?

In a similar note, what is wrong with the recalls and the 3 seconds they are all still? Ashe got other animations for those three seconds and then got removed. Are they meant to stay secret until release?

PROJECT: Katarina is a 1350 RP skin due to - 

- New model and texture 
- New particles for all of her kit
- New SFX for all of her kit
- New recall animation.
- VO processing 

Not all 1350 RP skins will include new animations. In PROJECT: Ekko's case, the animations aren't new - we simply changed the prop he was holding because it didn't make sense with the PROJECT thematic. It's considered a quality of life change - similar to what we do on some 750 RP skins as well. If part of the kit or emotes don't make sense with the current thematic, we'll change them so that they do. 

In PROJECT: Ashe's case, that animation was never meant to actually hit PBE - it was a trial for different recalls, and that iteration was something we felt was awkward and we felt didn't work out. 

Recalls aren't meant to be secret until release - 99% of our content isn't a secret before release, it's all on PBE first. What you're seeing in the current PBE build is what's going to be hitting live next.

Thank you for you answer, absolutely appreciate it, and I understand. Did not realize it was just replacing the book.

I am still wondering though, if there will be a spawn/re-spawn animation for PROJECT: Katarina, just the after image for a second would be pretty neat in my opinion.

Also I have a suggestion
If it is possible within the 1350 cost margin, it would be pretty nice and fun to add Katarina's secret joke in this skin. "Killing is my duty, fun is yelling surprise!". Currently this joke can only be heard by reaching Katarina's abilities tab and pressing Ctrl + 1. This joke might even be better than her current one.

I would like to point out that I do like the skin, it is actually the one I will be using the most from now on (I have every Katarina skin). And sadly the difference in skins probably comes from one having an overloaded, while the other has a basic kit.

No worries! :) 

There isn't a spawn/respawn animation for PROJECT: Katarina. 

I do like the idea of adding easter eggs, but it's not something we're opting to do with this skin. It's something we could try to implement more in the future, though! 

I totally get where you're coming from. It can seem a bit weird if one skin has a ton of particle work because the champion is particle heavy, as compared to a particle light champion like Kat.

Hi KateyKhaos! I was hoping I could ask you for clarification on something regarding Project Kat. I commented on the PBE Project Kat thread with my PBE account but I feel it was hardly noticed and not at all answered.

For Kat's hair in this Project skin, I understand you want it to be white to match the theme, but why is her hair pulled to one side? I feel like the falling hair on the right side of her head was the biggest and most iconic look of Kat. So when I play this new Kat skin on the PBE, it may feel like playing her but it looks so off, as if I'm playing Project Fiora with Kat abilities. (Am I really the only one who looks at the current Project Kat hairstyle and see just Project Fiora 2.0???)

I'm really happy you guys fixed the Q and W, it actually feels GOOD to play her now in that skin, but that hair part still makes me dislike this skin overall and I'm an absolutely obsessed with playing Katarina (we share similar names so it's only fair ^-^)

Heyo! 

Looks like Riot Aotus did reply about the hair in the thread, but may not have been directly to your comment.

"*I've seen a ton of feedback about Katarina's hair. One thing to keep in mind is that Kat's white hair and style actually fits within the PROJECT theme. All characters have white-silver hair. We want to keep her consistent with the rest of the PROJECT skins and likely won't be making any changes to her hair.*"

As for her hair style in general, we wanted to give Katarina a bit of a change while still maintaining the obviously noticeable flowing hair in the back. 

You're correct in that Katarina and Fiora do have similar looks, as do Lucian and Ekko. It's purposefully done to create cohesion in the skin line. 

Hope this explains things a bit better, and if not, lemme know! :)
